title: Tin Foil Hat Ep 12: Hip Hop and The Devil
description:
Thank you for tuning into Sam Tripoli presents Tin Foil Hat! On this episode I welcome comedian Aaron Bowman to talk Hip Hop and Satanism. On this episode we discuss..
1) Aleister Crowley
2) Rock N Roll and the Devil
3) The CIA
4) Blood Sacrifices
5) Lady Gaga and The Super Bowl Halftime Show
